text:
For those of you who use FTP when developing locally for access to the File Manager, the CMS CLI tooling now supports uploading files to the File Manager as well. Get started by following <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development>

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1577993373028300>

purpose:
How to connect to HubSpot via FTP
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/HubSpot-ftp>
FTP doesn’t support 2FA or SSO. Use <#CLJJXGTC0|> CLI with OAuth for better security.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development>
